output.sentences: I'm walking through a church and enjoying the beutiful stained glass art of religious figures in the windows.
I look at two stained glass figures wearing red robes and looking at eachother from their window.
I pass by an especially large and colorful window display that has ten separate panels and is shaed like a big archeway.
As I get closer to the front of the church, I pass the last window which has two men with halos of light around their heads.
I approach the front of the church.
